_comment: Some of the translations are in 'kubejs/client_scripts/lang.js', so you can look there (but don't touch!)
advancement.kubejs.root.title: MI:Foundation
advancement.kubejs.root.desc: You're only at the beginning of your journey
advancement.kubejs.fossilized_flower.tit: Is that a rock? No, wait...
advancement.kubejs.endgame.title: MI:Foundation God
endgame.mif.timeplay.part4: is how long you've spent — that's true dedication to the craft!
kubejs.phantom_feather.how_to_get_text_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a night fury.
kubejs.phantom_feather.how_to_get_text_2: conditions for catching a night fury: night, water, overworld.
kubejs.reforge_rune.tooltip: ✎ Allows you to reforge weapons/armor/tools in the anvil
kubejs.displacement_page.tooltip: 🧪 Page is used in conjunction with Displacement Tom
kubejs.teleport_pearl.tooltip: ✎ Pearls are used with «Displacement Tom» as a resource for teleportation, press RMB on the pearls.
kubejs.empty_beehive.tooltip: 🧪 Maybe I should try filling it with bees and honey?…
kubejs.beehive.tooltip: ★ Click with this Beehive on Bee Nest with SHIFT, to move in the Bumblezone!
kubejs.hirschgeist_heart.tooltip: 🗡 Defeat the mighty «Hirschgeist» and take his heart!
kubejs.zotzpyre_fang.tooltip: 🗡 Can be obtained from a «Zotzpyre» by killing him with the looting
kubejs.zotzpyre_flesh.tooltip: 🗡 Drops when killing the summoned mini-boss «Zotzpira»
kubejs.moth_wings.tooltip: 🗡 Drops when you kill a moth
kubejs.tears_of_the_sea.tooltip: 🎣 Small chance of obtaining when fishing.
kubejs.crystal_fiery.tooltip: 🗡 Drops when you kill a «Blaze guardian»
kubejs.dragons_blood_resin.tooltip: 🪓 If you make an incision using Athame on a dragonblood tree, the log will start bleeding!
kubejs.backpack_standard.tooltip: Can be created on a Pigment Pedestal
kubejs.waystone_scroll.tooltip: You can buy it at the shop
kubejs.cloud_in_a_bottle.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Ghost».
kubejs.cloud_in_a_bottle.tooltip_2: conditions for catching ghost: night, water, overworld.
kubejs.vampiric_glove.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Vampire».
kubejs.vampiric_glove.tooltip_2: conditions for catching Vampire: night, water, overworld.
kubejs.crystal_heart.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Fading Chrysolite».
kubejs.crystal_heart.tooltip_2: conditions for catching «Fading Chrysolite»: Liquid Crystal
kubejs.superstitious_hat.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Fading Chrysolite».
kubejs.superstitious_hat.tooltip_2: conditions for catching «Fading Chrysolite»: Liquid Crystal
kubejs.flippers.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Kraken», «Megalodon», «Sea Emperor».
kubejs.flippers.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Kraken»: night, water, overworld.
conditions for catching «Megalodon»: water, overworld.
conditions for catching «Sea Emperor»: water, overworld.
kubejs.snorkel.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Kraken», «Sea Emperor».
kubejs.snorkel.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Kraken»: night, water, overworld.
conditions for catching «Sea Emperor»: water, overworld.
kubejs.night_vision_goggles.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Watcher».
kubejs.monocle.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Watcher».
kubejs.antidote_vessel.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Crimson flesh», «Living root».
kubejs.antidote_vessel.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Crimson flesh»: Lava, Nether.
conditions for catching «Living root»: Liquid Mud.
kubejs.moss_necklace.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Fading Chrysolite», «Living root».
kubejs.moss_necklace.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Fading Chrysolite»: Liquid Crystal
conditions for catching «Living root»: Liquid Mud.
kubejs.hades_crystal.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Cursed abomination», «Crimson flesh».
kubejs.hades_crystal.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Cursed abomination»: Lava, Nether.
conditions for catching «Crimson flesh»: Lava, Nether.
kubejs.mining_gloves.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Red mold»
kubejs.mining_gloves.tooltip_2: conditions for catching «Red mold»: Lava, Nether.
kubejs.riot_gauntlet.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Red mold»
kubejs.riot_gauntlet.tooltip_2: conditions for catching «Red mold»: Lava, Nether.
kubejs.digging_claws.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Dark Dragon», «Risen from the dragonrot»
kubejs.digging_claws.tooltip_2:
conditions for catching «Dark Dragon»: Dragonrot.
conditions for catching «Risen from the dragonrot»: Dragonrot.
kubejs.feral_claws.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Dark Dragon»
kubejs.lucky_scarf.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Risen from the dragonrot»
kubejs.lucky_scarf.tooltip_2: conditions for catching «Risen from the dragonrot»: Dragonrot.
kubejs.running_shoes.tooltip_1: 🎣 can get by fishing creatures, from a «Nibbler»
